c74object.name: fl.spatial~
c74object.digest: Generates multiplication factors for a number of speakers from an input coordinate triple.
c74object.description: The alogirthm used is a modified version of DBAP, with extra features. Input may be in cartesian coordinates (x, y, z) or polar ones (azimuth, elevation, radius. Missing values at the input are assumed zero. Extra values are ignored. The output size is equal to the number of loudspeakers.

entry.name: 0. /inputmode [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the input coordinate mode.
[0] - polar [1] - cartesian

entry.name: 1. /speakers [variable length double array]
entry.description: Sets the speaker positions in polar triples (one triple per speaker).

entry.name: 2. /weights [variable length double array]
entry.description: Sets the speaker weightings (one value per speaker).

entry.name: 5. /maxspeakers [int]
entry.description: Sets the maximum number of speakers to be used (the neaarest N speakers will be used only). If zero all speakers are used.

entry.name: 6. /points [double]
entry.description: Interpolate to point source panning (0 is modified DBAP - 1 is point source).
